description: Enable your AI assistant to generate stunning images and perform various actions using Midjourney's capabilities. Interact seamlessly with the MCP to create, modify, and check prompts for your creative projects.

apiKey.description: Go to InstantMcp.com and create an account. Then go to the API Keys page and create an API Key.

logLevel.description: Log level for the server (e.g., debug, info, warn, error).

capabilities.name: midjourney_imagine
capabilities.description: Generate up to 4 images from a text prompt using Midjourney's image generation capabilities.

capabilities.name: midjourney_action
capabilities.description: Perform operations like upsampling, variations, zoom out, etc. on Midjourney-generated images.

capabilities.name: midjourney_seed
capabilities.description: Get the seed value from a Midjourney-generated image, which can be used for reproducibility.

capabilities.name: midjourney_blend
capabilities.description: Upload 2-5 images and combine them into a new image based on the concept and aesthetic of each image.

capabilities.name: midjourney_describe
capabilities.description: Upload an image and generate four prompts based on the image.

capabilities.name: midjourney_inpaint
capabilities.description: Modify specific regions of an image using a mask and optional prompt.

capabilities.name: midjourney_fetch_job
capabilities.description: Fetches the result status and details of a previously submitted Midjourney job using its Job ID.

capabilities.name: midjourney_prompt_check
capabilities.description: Checks if a given text prompt is compliant with Midjourney rules before potentially using it for generation. This is a free check.
